title: UK's Virgin Money says it has received takeover offer from CYBG
text:
May 7, 2018 / 8:24 PM / Updated 22 minutes ago UK's Virgin Money says it has received takeover offer from CYBG Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
May 7 (Reuters) - UK challenger bank Virgin Money Holdings (UK) Plc said on Monday that it had received a preliminary and conditional takeover offer from mid-sized bank CYBG Plc.
Virgin Money shareholders would receive 1.1297 new CYBG shares for each Virgin Money share, according to CYBGâ€™s proposal, Virgin Money said in an emailed statement.
Virgin Money said its board was reviewing the proposal. (Reporting by Ismail Shakil in Bengaluru; Editing by Kevin Liffey)
